channel.title: Okay wtf this is creepy
channel.description:
Hello,
So you may all know of this anonime phone callers who say weird shit but this time it was real creapy. A guy from in the 20 with a creepy voice says can i speak with stan i am his class mate Paul.
So wtf shud we do?
Ask the police?

item.title: Okay wtf this is creepy
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:15, topic:486450”]Okay this is serious. Ignore what everyone else says, take this 100% seriously. You should absolutely be concerned.

First, shut of your phone. Immediately. They can track the call if you answer it and find out exactly where you live.
Second, call the police. Explain everything, give the persons number, and tell them that they are threatening you and harassing you (which, in the state of Arizona, is listed as a crime under Ariz. Rev. Stat. § 13-2923 and Ariz. Rev. Stat. §§ 13-2916, 13-2921), and let them know that you feel unsafe.
Third, lock all of your doors. Close your windows, turn off your lights, and stay in a room with a locked door and access to a phone in the event that something happens.
Fourth (most important), keep “911” typed out on your phone if something does happen, put some kind of large object infront of the door, and chill out and quit taking everything so seriously[/quote]
You gave me my laugh of the day. :o

Read full topic

item.title: Okay wtf this is creepy
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Okay this is serious. Ignore what everyone else says, take this 100% seriously. You should absolutely be concerned.

First, shut of your phone. Immediately. They can track the call if you answer it and find out exactly where you live.
Second, call the police. Explain everything, give the persons number, and tell them that they are threatening you and harassing you (which, in the state of Arizona, is listed as a crime under Ariz. Rev. Stat. § 13-2923 and Ariz. Rev. Stat. §§ 13-2916, 13-2921), and let them know that you feel unsafe.
Third, lock all of your doors. Close your windows, turn off your lights, and stay in a room with a locked door and access to a phone in the event that something happens.
Fourth (most important), keep “911” typed out on your phone if something does happen, put some kind of large object infront of the door, and chill out and quit taking everything so seriously

Read full topic

item.title: Okay wtf this is creepy
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Fridder:

People call my brother with a restricted number and ask him what his ‘fucking problem is’ and threaten to track down his number to kill him or something… A guy calling for his classmate isn’t weird. Just a wrong number.

No he kept calling us for 2 days and he knows my name :o thats pretty weird

Read full topic
